Description:
[Sidecars on Azure App Service](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/app-service/overview-sidecar) let you run helper containers (telemetry, OTEL/monitoring agents, lightweight APIs, caches, AI helpers) **alongside** your main app—same app, shared lifecycle, localhost networking—without changing your core code. We’ve published ready-to-use templates for both GitHub Actions and Azure Pipelines (VSTS) so you can pick your CI/CD flavor and ship.

## Pick your CI/CD

- **GitHub Actions**: [Two sample workflows](https://azure.github.io/AppService/2025/09/08/GHA-templates-sidecars.html)—one for built-in runtimes (code-based apps) and one for containerized apps—to attach one or more sidecars via App Service’s sitecontainers configuration.
- **Azure Pipelines (VSTS)**: [Two YAML templates](https://azure.github.io/AppService/2025/10/29/VSTS-tasks-for-sidecars.html)—AzureWebApp@1 for code-based apps and AzureWebAppContainer@1 for containerized apps—that build and deploy your app **and** declare sidecars in a single run (mark one container isMain: true, others as sidecars).

## When to use which

- **Code-based app on built-in Linux runtime (Python/Node/.NET/Java/PHP, etc.)**
Use the “blessed/built-in runtime” template; your app keeps running on the App Service runtime, sidecars run next to it.
- **Custom container (Web App for Containers)**
Use the “containers” template to build/push multiple images and deploy them together.

## Quick start (both options)

1. **Add the template** to your repo (workflow for GitHub; YAML for VSTS).
2. **Wire up auth** (OIDC or service connection) and set app name, resource group, registry, and sidecar images/ports.
3. **Run the pipeline**; in the Azure portal you’ll see your main app plus defined sidecars.

## Links

- **GitHub Actions samples** (code-based & container) — [GitHub Actions samples: add sidecars to Azure App Service for Linux.](https://azure.github.io/AppService/2025/09/08/GHA-templates-sidecars.html)
- **Azure Pipelines samples** (code-based & container) — [Azure Pipeline samples: add sidecars to Azure App Service for Linux.](https://azure.github.io/AppService/2025/10/29/VSTS-tasks-for-sidecars.html)

Drop in a template, describe your sidecars, and ship—same App Service, more capability.
